query:
ALTER TABLE partner_deals 
CHANGE COLUMN customerphone customerPhone VARCHAR(20),
CHANGE COLUMN customerindustry customerIndustry VARCHAR(100),
CHANGE COLUMN customersize customerSize ENUM('1-50', '51-200', '201-1000', '1000+'),
CHANGE COLUMN dealamount dealAmount DECIMAL(12, 2),
CHANGE COLUMN dealstage dealStage ENUM('Prospect', 'Qualified', 'Proposal', 'Negotiation', 'Closed Won', 'Closed Lost'),
CHANGE COLUMN expectedclosedate expectedCloseDate DATE,
CHANGE COLUMN closeddate closedDate DATE,
CHANGE COLUMN productinterest productInterest VARCHAR(500),
CHANGE COLUMN commissionpercentage commissionPercentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
CHANGE COLUMN commissionamount commissionAmount DECIMAL(12, 2),
CHANGE COLUMN commissionpaid commissionPaid BOOLEAN,
CHANGE COLUMN commissionpaiddate commissionPaidDate DATE,
CHANGE COLUMN submittedby submittedBy INT,
CHANGE COLUMN internalowner internalOwner VARCHAR(255)
